articles.description: It also directed that no adverse orders be issued against EPFO and the government for not complying with the apex court’s 2019 judgment, which ordered that subscribers of the Employee Pension Scheme or EPS be given the full pension as calculated by their last…
articles.content: In a reprieve for the central government and the Employees Provident Fund Organisation (EPFO), the Supreme Court on Thursday restrained courts in the country from initiating contempt proceedings agai… [+1859 chars]
